amendment.description: To protect railroad carriers and mass transportation from terrorism.

action.text: Amendment SA 3873 ruled non-germane by the chair.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 3873.
Amendment SA 3873 proposed by Senator Sessions. (consideration: CR S10239-10242; text: CR S10239-10240) To protect railroad carriers and mass transportation from terrorism.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3873 proposed by Senator Sessions.
